attributes.action: remove the need for planning permission for polytunnels.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Polytunnels are a fruit and veg producers best friend, allowing crops to be started with a greater degree of protection than if planted straight into soil. Councils should not insist on planning permission for these as they are as temporary as a greenhouse.
Keep the UK growing it's own food!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "remove the need for planning permission for polytunnels."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15349.asp

Prime Minister's Office
